12 class V_COREEXPORT UnstructuredGrid: public Indexed, virtual public GridInterface {
13  V_OBJECT(UnstructuredGrid);

18  // make sure that these types match those from COVISE: src/kernel/do/coDoUnstructuredGrid.h
19  enum Type {
20  GHOST_BIT = 0x80,
21  CONVEX_BIT = 0x40, //<! cell was checked to be convex
22  TYPE_MASK = 0x3f,
23 
24  NONE = 0,
25  BAR = 1,
26  TRIANGLE = 2,
27  QUAD = 3,
28  TETRAHEDRON = 4,
29  PYRAMID = 5,
30  PRISM = 6,
31  HEXAHEDRON = 7,
32  POINT = 10,
33  POLYHEDRON = 11,
34 
35  GHOST_TETRAHEDRON = TETRAHEDRON|GHOST_BIT,
36  GHOST_PYRAMID = PYRAMID|GHOST_BIT,
37  GHOST_PRISM = PRISM|GHOST_BIT,
38  GHOST_HEXAHEDRON = HEXAHEDRON|GHOST_BIT,
39  GHOST_POLYHEDRON = POLYHEDRON|GHOST_BIT
40  };
41 
42  static const Index MaxNumVertices = 4;
43  static const Index MaxNumFaces = 6;
44

48  static const int FaceVertices[UnstructuredGrid::POLYHEDRON+1][MaxNumFaces][MaxNumVertices];
